archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Payoff Party Payment Plan
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Mark a payment plan as paid-off after the final payment has been made.

properties.value: Payoff Party Payment Plan marks a payment plan as paid-off after the final payment has been made. Send an acknowledgement to the party that the plan has been paid off. Note that this process is triggered by the applicable Party Payment Handling process that applies the final payment to a party payment plan.
